mapper.sql: id, product_id AS productId, remain_num AS remainNum, exchange_scroe AS exchangeScroe, remark, create_date AS createDate, create_user AS createUser, update_date AS updateDate, update_user AS updateUser, delete_flag AS deleteFlag
mapper.select: select s.id, p.id as productId; p.`product_name`, s.`remain_num`, s.`exchange_scroe`, f.`file_path` from wwq_score_mall as s LEFT JOIN `wwq_product` as p on p.`id`= s.`product_id` AND p.`deleteFlag`= 0 LEFT JOIN `wwq_product_file` as f on p.`id`= f.`product_id` and f.`deleteFlag` =0 where s.delete_flag= 0
